body:
Hi all, _Za here.

If you are not in Team Dexterity, there is no point in you reading this x3

I am aware that the scrimmages are now here, and am wanting the team to take part in a few when a lot of people are around. However, I am sorry to say that due to other matters I will not be around to take part in these scrimmages and it might be the case that I cannot participate in the tournament, although this depends on when it is.

We have two other leaders that can sort these scrimmage reserval times out, and I would be very appreciative if you can sort times out for this as I will more than likely be unable to set them up myself.

As always, everyone is free to join and if you wish to discuss becoming a Leader, please talk to me in game as I do not have Skype, or message HoshikageRyuu or SkylarCalibrator.

Thank you.

title: Quick Update - for Team Dexterity
